post.body: ... Hmm...I lost you there (?), but I refollowed you. I enjoy your tweets. :)
Not much lol. Enjoying the after Christmas quiet. Freezing-rainy out.
I can't believe the milkman even picks up milk from the Amish on Christmas morning LOL.
Good Morning and Merry Christmas! Thank you God for sending your son Jesus to save us! One more child to wake and then it's present time! :)
My Amish neighbors brought us a custard pie for Christmas. :)
Lil bit missed out on 3rd round pizza last night, so she's asking for it for breakfast lol. Why not. :P
Cleaning, baking, cooking, making! Coffee is on...extra dark this morning. Glass candy didn't turn out right lol. Try again?
Well, I was laying around contemplating life and the world, but it's time to get movin' and shakin'. Whewhoo Christmas Eve morning!
It's snowing...later tonite more snow/freezing rain! We are going out for one final trip to the grocery and a nice pizza lunch in between!
It stinks that our troops on holiday leave are stranded at airports due to bad weather. The airlines need to make them top priority!!
Time to get this party started! I'm backk!!
Feeling 89% better! lol. Gettin' on the morning chores!
Sipping RC and havin' some oyster crackers. I'm pulling thru. I've got so much to do tomorrow. WINDY & COLD. Happy Winter. :P
I am trying to recover from my turn with the flu. :( It's 1F, up to 2-4 inches snow, 45mph wind gusts, and wind chill to -26. :O ugh.
The girls are feeling little better. Thank God! :) I'm tired!
Did I say hoping? I meant PRAYING with a hopeful heart! ;) I'm going to grab some FRESH air!
So I am hoping we are done with this before Christmas! Amen!
On the bright side it seems to run its course in about a day.
Girls are sick w. flu now. Trying to comfort them best I can. We made it thru the snow/ice storm fine! :) argh...hit me w. a dbl. coffee!!
"The Strangers"...it didn't scare me...I coulda took 'em lol. Now I am just waiting on that foot of snow rolling in tonight.
